text: Mike Goodwin is an Oregonian professional fund raiser currently working as CEO of the Oregon State University Foundation.Johnson, Rebecca (3/10/11). "25 Influential People at OSU Part 4: Money Movers". The Daily Barometer. He is also on the board of trusties for the Council for Advancement and Support of Education."Member Profile: J. Michael Goodwin". == References == Category:Living people Category:People from Oregon Category:Oregon State University people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mike Goodwin
